meanings.definition: Glamorous or showy in an exaggerated or excessive way.
meanings.sent1: The glammy dress sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent2: She always wore glammy jewelry to parties.
meanings.sent3: The glammy decorations at the event made everyone feel like royalty.
meanings.sent4: Her glammy style was like a shining star in a dark sky.
meanings.sent5: The glammy outfit was so dazzling that it stole the show.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is glamorous or showy in an exaggerated or excessive way.
meanings.sent1: The actress was known as the glammy of the red carpet.
meanings.sent2: The car parked outside was a real glammy with its shiny exterior.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy thought he was a glammy with his fancy collar.
meanings.sent4: The old mansion stood out like a glammy among the modern buildings.
meanings.sent5: The peacock strutted around like a glammy showing off its colorful feathers.
